title: Don't Waste your Money - $30 vs $10,000 Racing Setup
description:
Thanks to EA SPORTS and Codemasters for sponsoring this video. EA SPORTS WRC is available to buy right now for Xbox, PlayStation, and PC: http://x.ea.com/wrc23/WRC-LTT

Alex wanted to build himself a new racing setup for his. So when we were given a chance to test out EA Sports WRC, we had to see how it held up to a budget racing wheel and our ultimate setup.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1539073-dont-waste-your-money-30-vs-10000-racing-setup/

Some of the hardware we used:
Next Level Racing GTLite Pro Foldable Racing Cockpit: https://geni.us/MVPA4
Logitech G27 Racing Wheel (on eBay): https://ebay.us/qcqqGL
Next Level Racing Lite Free Standing Monitor Stand: https://geni.us/XW7MskZ
Logitech K400 Plus Wireless Touch Keyboard: https://geni.us/sOKutvB
ANNX/MUGE RACING USB Handbrake: https://geni.us/5EZgu
Fanatic CSL DD Ready2Race WRC Bundle: https://lmg.gg/1hsNW
Sony DualSense Controller: https://geni.us/vWGfLG
ThrustMaster T80 Ferrari 488 GTB Edition: https://g
